headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts to Keep You Stylish & Secure
content:
Maze Bank Foreclosures is slashing the sticker price on select customization options for your Facility including a Security Room upgrade equipped with guns and goons to strike your foes whenever your heart desires. There's also two discounted vehicles designed to crush the competition with lethal proficiency:

- Facility Styles – 25% off
- Facility Graphics – 25% off
- Security Room – 25% off
- Buckingham Pyro (Plane) – 25% off
- HVY Nightshark (Weaponized Vehicle) – 25% off
